title: Sudden Impact lowering my FPS?
body:
So when the game updated to 7.22 and the new runes were available i made a new runepage and hoped into a game and it was great, then around the 20-25min mark my fps was at 18-25 and it didnt just drop suddenly it just gradually fell, eventually getting to where i was at 09-15fps at 35mins...after assuming it was my background programs i closed them, hoped into another game and the same thing happened.

Since i never had this problem i assumed it was the new patch causing it, so i swapped to a new set or runes and played and it worked perfectly, after experimenting more with it i got down to finding out that if i ran sudden impact it would effect my FPS.

Now i could just never use sudden impact again but thats a problem for me since i main assassins and its kind of a key rune for the champs i usually play.

I tried restarting my computer, troubleshooting, and redownloading league, but nothing seemed to work so ive come here in my last hope for help.

replies.body: Good eye pinpointing the potential cause here.  If a reinstall hasn't worked or troubleshooting, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a closer look.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to collect some logs and attach it to your ticket so we can get more context.
